sentence: The ethical debate around end-of-life decisions often includes a discussion about ______.
right_sentence: The ethical debate around end-of-life decisions often includes a discussion about euthanasia.

meaning: 완화 의료: 완치가 불가능한 질병으로 고통받는 환자의 삶의 질을 향상시키는 의료
sentence: Instead of curative treatments, the patient's family opted for ______ to focus on comfort and symptom management.
right_sentence: Instead of curative treatments, the patient's family opted for palliative care to focus on comfort and symptom management.

meaning: 호스피스: 말기 환자가 편안하게 남은 시간을 보낼 수 있도록 돕는 의료 및 돌봄 서비스
sentence: He was moved to ______ when his cancer was no longer responsive to treatment.
right_sentence: He was moved to hospice care when his cancer was no longer responsive to treatment.

meaning: 경막 외 마취: 척수 신경 주변에 약물을 주입하여 통증을 줄이는 마취 방법
sentence: She received a(n) ______ during childbirth to help manage the pain.
right_sentence: She received an epidural during childbirth to help manage the pain.

meaning: 전신 마취: 환자를 의식 없는 상태로 만들어 수술을 진행하는 마취 방법
sentence: For major heart surgery, the patient was put under ______.
right_sentence: For major heart surgery, the patient was put under general anesthesia.

meaning: 국소 마취: 신체 일부만 마취하여 통증을 느끼지 못하게 하는 방법
sentence: The dentist used a(n) ______ to numb the area around the tooth before extracting it.
right_sentence: The dentist used a local anesthesia to numb the area around the tooth before extracting it.

meaning: 정맥 주사: 정맥에 직접 약물이나 수액을 주입하는 것
sentence: The patient received fluids and medication through a(n) ______ line.
right_sentence: The patient received fluids and medication through an intravenous (IV) line.

meaning: 피하 주사: 피부 아래 조직에 약물을 주입하는 것
sentence: Insulin is typically administered through a(n) ______ injection.
right_sentence: Insulin is typically administered through a subcutaneous injection.

meaning: 근육 주사: 근육에 직접 약물을 주입하는 것
sentence: The flu shot is usually given as a(n) ______ injection in the arm.
right_sentence: The flu shot is usually given as an intramuscular (IM) injection in the arm.

meaning: 인공 삽입물: 신체 일부를 대체하거나 보조하는 인공 장치
sentence: After losing his leg, he was fitted with a new ______ to help him walk again.
right_sentence: After losing his leg, he was fitted with a new prosthesis to help him walk again.

meaning: 교정기: 신체 기능이나 구조를 교정하고 보조하는 장치
sentence: Custom foot ______ were made to correct her gait and relieve foot pain.
right_sentence: Custom foot orthotics were made to correct her gait and relieve foot pain.

meaning: 스텐트: 혈관이나 관의 내부를 넓히고 유지하는 데 사용되는 작은 관
sentence: A coronary ______ was inserted to open up the blocked artery in his heart.
right_sentence: A coronary stent was inserted to open up the blocked artery in his heart.

meaning: 심박 조율기: 심장 박동을 조절하는 데 사용되는 의료 기기
sentence: He had a(n) ______ implanted to correct his irregular heartbeat.
right_sentence: He had a pacemaker implanted to correct his irregular heartbeat.

meaning: 제세동기: 심장에 전기 충격을 주어 비정상적인 심장 박동을 정상으로 되돌리는 의료 기기
sentence: A paramedic used a(n) ______ to shock the patient's heart and restore a normal rhythm.
right_sentence: A paramedic used a defibrillator to shock the patient's heart and restore a normal rhythm.

meaning: 인공호흡기: 환자가 스스로 호흡할 수 없을 때 호흡을 돕는 기계
sentence: The patient in the intensive care unit was on a(n) ______ to support his breathing.
right_sentence: The patient in the intensive care unit was on a ventilator to support his breathing.

meaning: 위 우회술: 비만 치료를 위해 위와 소장을 연결하는 수술
sentence: As a last resort for severe obesity, the doctor recommended a(n) ______ surgery.
right_sentence: As a last resort for severe obesity, the doctor recommended a gastric bypass surgery.

meaning: 충수 절제술: 충수염 치료를 위해 충수를 제거하는 수술
sentence: The surgeon performed a(n) ______ to remove the patient's inflamed appendix.
right_sentence: The surgeon performed an appendectomy to remove the patient's inflamed appendix.

meaning: 담낭 절제술: 담낭 질환 치료를 위해 담낭을 제거하는 수술
sentence: The patient with severe gallstones underwent a(n) ______ to remove the gallbladder.
right_sentence: The patient with severe gallstones underwent a cholecystectomy to remove the gallbladder.

meaning: 자궁 절제술: 자궁 질환 치료를 위해 자궁을 제거하는 수술
sentence: The woman had a(n) ______ to treat her uterine fibroids and chronic pain.
right_sentence: The woman had a hysterectomy to treat her uterine fibroids and chronic pain.

meaning: 유방 절제술: 유방암 치료를 위해 유방을 제거하는 수술
sentence: The patient decided to have a(n) ______ after being diagnosed with breast cancer.
right_sentence: The patient decided to have a mastectomy after being diagnosed with breast cancer.

meaning: 편도선 절제술: 편도선 질환 치료를 위해 편도선을 제거하는 수술
sentence: The child who suffered from frequent strep throat infections had a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The child who suffered from frequent strep throat infections had a tonsillectomy.

meaning: 복강경 수술: 복강경을 이용하여 복부 수술을 하는 방법
sentence: The doctor performed a minimally invasive procedure called a(n) ______ to remove the patient's appendix.
right_sentence: The doctor performed a minimally invasive procedure called a laparoscopy to remove the patient's appendix.

meaning: 관절경 수술: 관절경을 이용하여 관절 내부를 진단하고 치료하는 수술
sentence: The surgeon used a(n) ______ to repair the torn meniscus in the patient's knee.
right_sentence: The surgeon used an arthroscopy to repair the torn meniscus in the patient's knee.

meaning: 혈관 성형술: 좁아진 혈관을 넓히는 시술
sentence: He had a balloon ______ to open up the blocked coronary artery.
right_sentence: He had a balloon angioplasty to open up the blocked coronary artery.

sentence: The doctor performed a cardiac ______ to correct the patient's irregular heart rhythm.
right_sentence: The doctor performed a cardiac ablation to correct the patient's irregular heart rhythm.

meaning: 냉동 수술: 액체 질소 등을 이용하여 비정상적인 조직을 얼려 파괴하는 수술
sentence: The dermatologist used ______ to remove the wart on her hand.
right_sentence: The dermatologist used cryosurgery to remove the wart on her hand.

meaning: 레이저 수술: 레이저를 이용하여 조직을 절단하거나 응고시키는 수술
sentence: He had a quick procedure to remove his cataracts using ______.
right_sentence: He had a quick procedure to remove his cataracts using laser surgery.

meaning: 로봇 수술: 로봇을 이용하여 수술을 하는 방법
sentence: The hospital recently acquired a new system for minimally invasive ______.
right_sentence: The hospital recently acquired a new system for minimally invasive robotic surgery.

meaning: 방사선 촬영: X-선 등을 이용하여 인체 내부를 촬영하는 기술
sentence: The doctor ordered a chest ______ to check for signs of pneumonia.
right_sentence: The doctor ordered a chest radiography to check for signs of pneumonia.

meaning: 형광 투시: X-선으로 신체 내부의 움직임을 실시간으로 관찰하는 기술
sentence: A doctor used ______ to guide the catheter during a cardiac procedure.
right_sentence: A doctor used fluoroscopy to guide the catheter during a cardiac procedure.

meaning: 양전자 방출 단층 촬영: 방사성 의약품을 이용하여 신체 내부의 대사 활동을 영상화하는 검사
sentence: A(n) ______ scan was used to see if the cancer had spread to other parts of the body.
right_sentence: A positron emission tomography (PET) scan was used to see if the cancer had spread to other parts of the body.

meaning: 자기 공명 혈관 조영술: MRI를 이용하여 혈관을 영상화하는 검사
sentence: The doctor ordered a(n) ______ to check for a blockage in the patient's carotid artery.
right_sentence: The doctor ordered a magnetic resonance angiography (MRA) to check for a blockage in the patient's carotid artery.

meaning: 심전도 검사: 심장의 전기적 활동을 기록하는 검사
sentence: The patient's rapid heartbeat was confirmed by a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The patient's rapid heartbeat was confirmed by an electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

meaning: 뇌전도 검사: 뇌의 전기적 활동을 기록하는 검사
sentence: The neurologist performed a(n) ______ to investigate the patient's seizure activity.
right_sentence: The neurologist performed an electroencephalogram (EEG) to investigate the patient's seizure activity.

meaning: 근전도 검사: 근육의 전기적 활동을 기록하는 검사
sentence: A(n) ______ was performed to diagnose a nerve disorder in the patient's leg.
right_sentence: An electromyography (EMG) was performed to diagnose a nerve disorder in the patient's leg.

meaning: 소변 검사: 소변을 분석하여 질병을 진단하는 검사
sentence: The doctor ordered a(n) ______ to check for signs of a urinary tract infection.
right_sentence: The doctor ordered an urinalysis to check for signs of a urinary tract infection.

meaning: 혈액 검사: 혈액을 분석하여 질병을 진단하는 검사
sentence: A routine ______ was performed to check for cholesterol levels and blood sugar.
right_sentence: A routine blood test was performed to check for cholesterol levels and blood sugar.

meaning: 전혈구 검사: 혈액 내 세포의 수와 종류를 측정하는 검사
sentence: The doctor ordered a(n) ______ to check for signs of anemia or infection.
right_sentence: The doctor ordered a complete blood count (CBC) to check for signs of anemia or infection.

meaning: 요추 천자: 척수액을 채취하여 검사하는 시술
sentence: To diagnose meningitis, the doctor performed a(n) ______ to collect a sample of cerebrospinal fluid.
right_sentence: To diagnose meningitis, the doctor performed a lumbar puncture to collect a sample of cerebrospinal fluid.

meaning: 예방 접종: 백신을 접종하여 특정 질병에 대한 면역력을 만드는 것
sentence: All children are required to get a series of ______s before starting school.
right_sentence: All children are required to get a series of vaccinations before starting school.

meaning: 면역: 특정 질병에 대한 면역력을 만드는 과정
sentence: The flu shot provides seasonal ______ against the influenza virus.
right_sentence: The flu shot provides seasonal immunization against the influenza virus.

meaning: 알레르기: 특정 항원에 대한 과민 반응
sentence: He has a severe peanut ______ and must carry an epinephrine injection with him.
right_sentence: He has a severe peanut allergy and must carry an epinephrine injection with him.

meaning: 자가면역 질환: 면역 체계가 자신의 몸을 공격하는 질병
sentence: Multiple sclerosis and rheumatoid arthritis are examples of a(n) ______.
right_sentence: Multiple sclerosis and rheumatoid arthritis are examples of an autoimmune disease.

meaning: 염증: 신체 조직이 손상되었을 때 나타나는 면역 반응
sentence: The swelling and redness around the wound were signs of ______.
right_sentence: The swelling and redness around the wound were signs of inflammation.

meaning: 부종: 조직에 과도한 체액이 축적되어 붓는 현상
sentence: The patient's swollen ankles were a sign of peripheral ______.
right_sentence: The patient's swollen ankles were a sign of peripheral edema.

meaning: 패혈증: 감염으로 인해 전신에 염증 반응이 나타나는 심각한 질환
sentence: The elderly patient was rushed to the emergency room with a high fever and confusion, classic signs of ______.
right_sentence: The elderly patient was rushed to the emergency room with a high fever and confusion, classic signs of sepsis.

meaning: 쇼크: 혈액 순환이 급격히 감소하여 중요 장기에 산소 공급이 부족한 상태
sentence: After the severe injury, the patient went into hypovolemic ______ from blood loss.
right_sentence: After the severe injury, the patient went into hypovolemic shock from blood loss.

meaning: 혼수: 의식, 감각, 운동 기능이 상실된 깊은 무의식 상태
sentence: He was in a(n) ______ after the serious head injury.
right_sentence: He was in a coma after the serious head injury.

meaning: 뇌졸중: 뇌 혈관 문제로 인한 뇌 손상
sentence: Sudden weakness on one side of his body indicated a possible ______.
right_sentence: Sudden weakness on one side of his body indicated a possible stroke.

meaning: 일과성 허혈 발작: 뇌졸중과 유사한 증상이 일시적으로 나타났다가 사라지는 상태
sentence: He had a brief episode of slurred speech and weakness, a condition often called a 'mini-stroke' or a(n) ______.
right_sentence: He had a brief episode of slurred speech and weakness, a condition often called a 'mini-stroke' or a transient ischemic attack (TIA).

meaning: 빈혈: 혈액 내 적혈구 또는 헤모글로빈이 부족한 상태
sentence: She felt constantly tired and pale, which were symptoms of iron deficiency ______.
right_sentence: She felt constantly tired and pale, which were symptoms of iron deficiency anemia.

meaning: 백혈병: 골수에서 비정상적인 백혈구가 과도하게 생성되는 암
sentence: The child's frequent infections and unexplained bruising were signs of ______.
right_sentence: The child's frequent infections and unexplained bruising were signs of leukemia.

meaning: 림프종: 림프절과 같은 림프계 조직에서 발생하는 암
sentence: Swollen, painless lymph nodes in his neck were a possible sign of ______.
right_sentence: Swollen, painless lymph nodes in his neck were a possible sign of lymphoma.

meaning: 혈우병: 혈액 응고 인자가 부족하여 지혈이 어려운 유전 질환
sentence: He had to be careful to avoid even small cuts due to his inherited blood disorder, ______.
right_sentence: He had to be careful to avoid even small cuts due to his inherited blood disorder, hemophilia.

meaning: 혈전증: 혈관 내에 혈전(피떡)이 생겨 혈액 흐름을 막는 질환
sentence: Immobility after the surgery increased his risk of deep vein ______.
right_sentence: Immobility after the surgery increased his risk of deep vein thrombosis.

meaning: 색전증: 혈전, 지방, 기포 등이 혈관을 막는 질환
sentence: A blood clot traveled from his leg to his lung, causing a pulmonary ______.
right_sentence: A blood clot traveled from his leg to his lung, causing a pulmonary embolism.

meaning: 동맥류: 혈관 벽이 약해져 풍선처럼 부풀어 오르는 질환
sentence: The surgeon was concerned about the large ______ in his aorta and recommended surgery.
right_sentence: The surgeon was concerned about the large aneurysm in his aorta and recommended surgery.

sentence: Regular blood pressure checks are important for managing ______.
right_sentence: Regular blood pressure checks are important for managing hypertension.

meaning: 저혈압: 혈압이 정상 범위보다 낮은 상태
sentence: The patient's dizziness and lightheadedness were symptoms of orthostatic ______.
right_sentence: The patient's dizziness and lightheadedness were symptoms of orthostatic hypotension.

meaning: 부정맥: 심장 박동이 불규칙하거나 비정상적인 상태
sentence: He felt his heart skipping beats, which was a symptom of cardiac ______.
right_sentence: He felt his heart skipping beats, which was a symptom of cardiac arrhythmia.

meaning: 심근경색: 심장 근육의 혈액 공급 부족으로 인한 손상
sentence: The chest pain was so severe that the doctors suspected he was having a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The chest pain was so severe that the doctors suspected he was having a myocardial infarction.

meaning: 심부전: 심장이 신체의 혈액 공급 요구를 충족하지 못하는 상태
sentence: Shortness of breath and fluid retention are common symptoms of congestive ______.
right_sentence: Shortness of breath and fluid retention are common symptoms of congestive heart failure.

meaning: 심근병증: 심장 근육이 약해지거나 변형되는 질환
sentence: The doctor diagnosed him with dilated ______, where the heart chambers are enlarged.
right_sentence: The doctor diagnosed him with dilated cardiomyopathy, where the heart chambers are enlarged.

sentence: A chest X-ray revealed that the patient's cough and fever were caused by a bacterial ______.
right_sentence: A chest X-ray revealed that the patient's cough and fever were caused by a bacterial pneumonia.

sentence: His persistent cough was a symptom of acute ______.
right_sentence: His persistent cough was a symptom of acute bronchitis.

meaning: 천식: 기관지 염증으로 인한 호흡 곤란
sentence: She used her inhaler to open up her airways during a(n) ______ attack.
right_sentence: She used her inhaler to open up her airways during an asthma attack.

meaning: 폐기종: 폐포가 손상되어 호흡 곤란이 발생하는 만성 폐 질환
sentence: His chronic shortness of breath was a result of years of heavy smoking, which led to ______.
right_sentence: His chronic shortness of breath was a result of years of heavy smoking, which led to emphysema.

meaning: 결핵: 폐를 주로 침범하는 세균성 감염병
sentence: The patient with a persistent cough and night sweats was tested for ______.
right_sentence: The patient with a persistent cough and night sweats was tested for tuberculosis (TB).

meaning: 기흉: 폐와 흉벽 사이 공간에 공기가 차는 질환
sentence: He experienced a sudden, sharp pain in his chest after a car accident, and an X-ray showed he had a(n) ______.
right_sentence: He experienced a sudden, sharp pain in his chest after a car accident, and an X-ray showed he had a pneumothorax.

meaning: 낭포성 섬유증: 여러 기관의 점액이 끈적해지는 유전 질환
sentence: This genetic disorder causes thick, sticky mucus to clog the lungs and pancreas, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: This genetic disorder causes thick, sticky mucus to clog the lungs and pancreas, a condition known as cystic fibrosis.

meaning: 충수염: 맹장 끝에 위치한 충수 돌기에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The sharp pain in his lower right abdomen was diagnosed as ______ and required immediate surgery.
right_sentence: The sharp pain in his lower right abdomen was diagnosed as appendicitis and required immediate surgery.

meaning: 위염: 위 점막에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: His stomach pain and nausea were symptoms of chronic ______.
right_sentence: His stomach pain and nausea were symptoms of chronic gastritis.

meaning: 궤양: 피부나 점막에 깊이 파인 병변
sentence: The doctor prescribed an antacid to help heal the stomach ______.
right_sentence: The doctor prescribed an antacid to help heal the stomach ulcer.

meaning: 위장염: 위와 장에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The patient had severe vomiting and diarrhea, which were symptoms of viral ______.
right_sentence: The patient had severe vomiting and diarrhea, which were symptoms of viral gastroenteritis.

meaning: 게실염: 대장의 작은 주머니(게실)에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The doctor recommended a high-fiber diet to prevent a recurrence of his ______.
right_sentence: The doctor recommended a high-fiber diet to prevent a recurrence of his diverticulitis.

meaning: 과민성 대장 증후군: 복통, 복부 팽만, 배변 습관 변화를 동반하는 만성 기능성 위장 질환
sentence: She learned to manage her symptoms of cramping and bloating by following a special diet for her ______.
right_sentence: She learned to manage her symptoms of cramping and bloating by following a special diet for her irritable bowel syndrome (IBS).

meaning: 크론병: 입에서 항문까지 소화관 전체에 염증을 일으키는 만성 염증성 장 질환
sentence: This inflammatory bowel disease can affect any part of the digestive tract, and is known as ______.
right_sentence: This inflammatory bowel disease can affect any part of the digestive tract, and is known as crohn's disease.

meaning: 궤양성 대장염: 대장 점막에 염증과 궤양이 생기는 만성 염증성 장 질환
sentence: Unlike Crohn's disease, this inflammatory bowel disease is limited to the large intestine and rectum and is called ______.
right_sentence: Unlike Crohn's disease, this inflammatory bowel disease is limited to the large intestine and rectum and is called ulcerative colitis.

meaning: 간경변증: 간이 만성적인 염증으로 인해 굳어지는 질환
sentence: Heavy drinking over many years can lead to liver scarring, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: Heavy drinking over many years can lead to liver scarring, a condition known as cirrhosis.

sentence: Yellowing of the skin and eyes, called jaundice, is a key symptom of viral ______.
right_sentence: Yellowing of the skin and eyes, called jaundice, is a key symptom of viral hepatitis.

sentence: She experienced severe, sharp pain in her upper right abdomen after eating a fatty meal, a sign of ______.
right_sentence: She experienced severe, sharp pain in her upper right abdomen after eating a fatty meal, a sign of gallstones.

sentence: The inflammation of the gallbladder, often caused by gallstones, is known as ______.
right_sentence: The inflammation of the gallbladder, often caused by gallstones, is known as cholecystitis.

sentence: Alcohol abuse is a leading cause of chronic ______.
right_sentence: Alcohol abuse is a leading cause of chronic pancreatitis.

sentence: A kidney biopsy revealed inflammation of the kidney's filtering units, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: A kidney biopsy revealed inflammation of the kidney's filtering units, a condition known as nephritis.

meaning: 신부전: 신장이 기능을 상실하여 노폐물을 제거하지 못하는 상태
sentence: The patient was placed on a donor waiting list due to end-stage ______.
right_sentence: The patient was placed on a donor waiting list due to end-stage renal failure.

meaning: 투석: 신장 기능이 상실된 환자의 혈액을 정화하는 의료 시술
sentence: Since his kidneys failed, he had to go to the hospital several times a week for ______.
right_sentence: Since his kidneys failed, he had to go to the hospital several times a week for dialysis.

meaning: 요독증: 신장 기능 부전으로 인해 혈액에 독성 물질이 쌓이는 상태
sentence: The patient's confusion and nausea were caused by the buildup of waste products in his blood, a condition called ______.
right_sentence: The patient's confusion and nausea were caused by the buildup of waste products in his blood, a condition called uremia.

sentence: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for her urinary tract infection, which had caused inflammation of the bladder, or ______.
right_sentence: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for her urinary tract infection, which had caused inflammation of the bladder, or cystitis.

sentence: The man's fever, chills, and painful urination were symptoms of acute ______.
right_sentence: The man's fever, chills, and painful urination were symptoms of acute prostatitis.

meaning: 녹내장: 안압 상승으로 시신경이 손상되어 시야가 좁아지는 질환
sentence: Regular eye exams are crucial for detecting the early stages of a condition called ______.
right_sentence: Regular eye exams are crucial for detecting the early stages of a condition called glaucoma.

meaning: 백내장: 눈의 수정체가 혼탁해져 시력이 저하되는 질환
sentence: As he aged, his vision became cloudy due to the development of a(n) ______.
right_sentence: As he aged, his vision became cloudy due to the development of a cataract.

meaning: 황반 변성: 망막의 중심부(황반)가 손상되어 시야 중심부가 흐려지는 질환
sentence: The leading cause of blindness in older adults is a condition called age-related ______.
right_sentence: The leading cause of blindness in older adults is a condition called age-related macular degeneration.

meaning: 근시: 가까운 것은 잘 보이나 먼 것은 흐릿하게 보이는 상태
sentence: She has a high degree of ______ and cannot see things clearly without her glasses.
right_sentence: She has a high degree of myopia and cannot see things clearly without her glasses.

meaning: 원시: 가까운 것은 흐릿하게 보이나 먼 것은 잘 보이는 상태
sentence: Reading a book up close is difficult for her due to her ______.
right_sentence: Reading a book up close is difficult for her due to her hyperopia.

meaning: 난시: 눈의 굴절면이 불균형하여 상이 흐릿하게 보이는 상태
sentence: The optometrist explained that her blurry vision was caused by a slight imperfection in the curvature of her cornea, which is called ______.
right_sentence: The optometrist explained that her blurry vision was caused by a slight imperfection in the curvature of her cornea, which is called astigmatism.

sentence: The child's earache and fever were signs of a middle ear infection, or ______.
right_sentence: The child's earache and fever were signs of a middle ear infection, or otitis media.

meaning: 이명: 외부 소리 없이 귀에서 소리가 들리는 현상
sentence: The constant ringing in his ears was a bothersome symptom of his chronic ______.
right_sentence: The constant ringing in his ears was a bothersome symptom of his chronic tinnitus.

meaning: 어지럼증: 자신이나 주위 환경이 빙글빙글 도는 듯한 느낌
sentence: He experienced a severe episode of spinning dizziness, which the doctor diagnosed as ______.
right_sentence: He experienced a severe episode of spinning dizziness, which the doctor diagnosed as vertigo.

meaning: 부비동염: 코 주위의 부비동에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The doctor prescribed a nasal spray to treat the inflammation of his sinuses, or ______.
right_sentence: The doctor prescribed a nasal spray to treat the inflammation of his sinuses, or sinusitis.

meaning: 편도선염: 목의 편도에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: His sore throat and difficulty swallowing were caused by a bacterial infection of the tonsils, which is known as ______.
right_sentence: His sore throat and difficulty swallowing were caused by a bacterial infection of the tonsils, which is known as tonsillitis.

meaning: 건선: 피부에 붉은 반점과 은백색 인설이 나타나는 만성 질환
sentence: She has a chronic skin condition with thick, silvery patches on her elbows and knees, which is a symptom of ______.
right_sentence: She has a chronic skin condition with thick, silvery patches on her elbows and knees, which is a symptom of psoriasis.

meaning: 습진: 피부에 나타나는 만성적인 염증성 질환
sentence: The child's red, itchy rash on the face and arms was a flare-up of his ______.
right_sentence: The child's red, itchy rash on the face and arms was a flare-up of his eczema.

sentence: The allergic reaction to the new soap caused a(n) ______ on her hands.
right_sentence: The allergic reaction to the new soap caused a dermatitis on her hands.

meaning: 골다공증: 뼈의 밀도가 낮아져 골절 위험이 높아지는 질환
sentence: The elderly woman fell and broke her hip due to weakened bones from ______.
right_sentence: The elderly woman fell and broke her hip due to weakened bones from osteoporosis.

sentence: The patient with rheumatoid ______ experienced severe joint pain and stiffness in her hands.
right_sentence: The patient with rheumatoid arthritis experienced severe joint pain and stiffness in her hands.

meaning: 통풍: 요산이 관절에 쌓여 염증과 통증을 유발하는 질환
sentence: A painful, swollen big toe is a classic symptom of a(n) ______ attack.
right_sentence: A painful, swollen big toe is a classic symptom of a gout attack.

meaning: 척추측만증: 척추가 비정상적으로 옆으로 휘는 상태
sentence: A screening at school revealed a noticeable curve in the child's spine, which was diagnosed as ______.
right_sentence: A screening at school revealed a noticeable curve in the child's spine, which was diagnosed as scoliosis.

meaning: 탈장: 신체 장기가 제자리를 벗어나 튀어나오는 질환
sentence: He developed a small bulge in his groin area that was diagnosed as an inguinal ______.
right_sentence: He developed a small bulge in his groin area that was diagnosed as an inguinal hernia.

meaning: 아나필락시스: 급성, 전신성, 알레르기성 과민 반응
sentence: She went into ______ after being stung by a bee, so the paramedics administered an epinephrine injection.
right_sentence: She went into anaphylaxis after being stung by a bee, so the paramedics administered an epinephrine injection.

sentence: The doctor prescribed a(n) ______ to relieve his hay fever symptoms.
right_sentence: The doctor prescribed an antihistamine to relieve his hay fever symptoms.

sentence: He was given a(n) ______ to treat his bacterial infection.
right_sentence: He was given an antibiotic to treat his bacterial infection.

sentence: She took a(n) ______ to ease her headache.
right_sentence: She took an analgesic to ease her headache.

sentence: The mother gave her child a(n) ______ to bring down his fever.
right_sentence: The mother gave her child an antipyretic to bring down his fever.

sentence: His doctor recommended a(n) ______ to reduce the swelling in his knee.
right_sentence: His doctor recommended an anti-inflammatory to reduce the swelling in his knee.

sentence: The patient was prescribed a(n) ______ to prevent blood clots.
right_sentence: The patient was prescribed an anticoagulant to prevent blood clots.

sentence: The doctor prescribed a(n) ______ to help the patient with fluid retention.
right_sentence: The doctor prescribed a diuretic to help the patient with fluid retention.

meaning: 진정제: 중추 신경계를 억제하여 진정 효과를 내는 약물
sentence: A mild ______ was given to the patient to help them relax before the procedure.
right_sentence: A mild sedative was given to the patient to help them relax before the procedure.

sentence: The doctor prescribed a(n) ______ to treat the patient's insomnia.
right_sentence: The doctor prescribed a hypnotic to treat the patient's insomnia.

meaning: 정신 약물: 정신 상태와 행동에 영향을 미치는 약물
sentence: The psychiatrist prescribed a(n) ______ medication to treat the patient's severe depression.
right_sentence: The psychiatrist prescribed a psychotropic medication to treat the patient's severe depression.

sentence: LSD is a powerful ______ that alters perception, mood, and consciousness.
right_sentence: LSD is a powerful hallucinogen that alters perception, mood, and consciousness.

meaning: 마약: 통증을 줄이고 수면을 유도하는 중독성 약물
sentence: The patient was given a strong ______ for the severe pain after the surgery.
right_sentence: The patient was given a strong narcotic for the severe pain after the surgery.

sentence: In the clinical trial, some patients received the real drug while others received a(n) ______ to test its effectiveness.
right_sentence: In the clinical trial, some patients received the real drug while others received a placebo to test its effectiveness.

meaning: 부작용: 약물 사용 시 나타나는 원치 않는 효과
sentence: Dizziness was a common ______ of the new medication.
right_sentence: Dizziness was a common adverse effect of the new medication.

meaning: 부수적 효과: 약물 사용 시 나타나는 부가적인 효과
sentence: A dry mouth is a well-known ______ of this type of medication.
right_sentence: A dry mouth is a well-known side effect of this type of medication.

meaning: 약리학: 약물의 작용, 효과, 부작용 등을 연구하는 학문
sentence: The student is studying ______ to learn about how drugs interact with the body.
right_sentence: The student is studying pharmacology to learn about how drugs interact with the body.

meaning: 독성학: 독성 물질의 작용과 해독을 연구하는 학문
sentence: The forensic pathologist consulted a(n) ______ report to determine the cause of death.
right_sentence: The forensic pathologist consulted a toxicology report to determine the cause of death.

sentence: The doctor adjusted the ______ of the medication based on the patient's body weight.
right_sentence: The doctor adjusted the dosage of the medication based on the patient's body weight.

meaning: 내성: 약물에 대한 반응이 감소하는 현상
sentence: He developed a high ______ to the pain medication, requiring a higher dose to achieve the same effect.
right_sentence: He developed a high tolerance to the pain medication, requiring a higher dose to achieve the same effect.

meaning: 중독: 약물에 대한 강박적 의존 상태
sentence: The patient was struggling with a prescription opioid ______ and sought treatment.
right_sentence: The patient was struggling with a prescription opioid addiction and sought treatment.

meaning: 금단 증상: 중독성 약물을 중단했을 때 나타나는 신체적, 정신적 증상
sentence: The patient experienced severe headaches and nausea during nicotine ______.
right_sentence: The patient experienced severe headaches and nausea during nicotine withdrawal.

meaning: 생명 공학: 생물학적 시스템을 이용하여 제품을 만들거나 기술을 개발하는 학문
sentence: Researchers are using ______ to develop new vaccines and gene therapies.
right_sentence: Researchers are using biotechnology to develop new vaccines and gene therapies.

meaning: 유전 공학: 유전자를 인위적으로 조작하는 기술
sentence: The team is using ______ to create a new type of crop that is resistant to disease.
right_sentence: The team is using genetic engineering to create a new type of crop that is resistant to disease.

meaning: 유전자 치료: 유전자를 이용하여 질병을 치료하는 방법
sentence: This new approach to medicine uses a(n) ______ technique to correct a defective gene.
right_sentence: This new approach to medicine uses a gene therapy technique to correct a defective gene.

meaning: 줄기 세포: 다양한 종류의 세포로 분화할 수 있는 능력을 가진 세포
sentence: Scientists are studying how to use a(n) ______ to regenerate damaged tissues.
right_sentence: Scientists are studying how to use a stem cell to regenerate damaged tissues.

meaning: 재생 의학: 손상된 조직이나 장기를 재생하는 것을 목표로 하는 의학 분야
sentence: Doctors are exploring new treatments in ______ to repair heart muscle after a heart attack.
right_sentence: Doctors are exploring new treatments in regenerative medicine to repair heart muscle after a heart attack.

meaning: 복제: 유전적으로 동일한 개체를 만드는 것
sentence: The ethical implications of human ______ are a major topic of debate.
right_sentence: The ethical implications of human cloning are a major topic of debate.

meaning: 유전체학: 한 개체의 모든 유전자를 연구하는 학문
sentence: The field of ______ is helping doctors understand the genetic basis of many diseases.
right_sentence: The field of genomics is helping doctors understand the genetic basis of many diseases.

meaning: 단백체학: 한 개체의 모든 단백질을 연구하는 학문
sentence: The study of ______ can provide insights into how proteins function and interact with each other.
right_sentence: The study of proteomics can provide insights into how proteins function and interact with each other.

meaning: 생물 정보학: 생물학적 데이터를 컴퓨터로 분석하는 학문
sentence: Using powerful computers and algorithms, ______ is used to analyze large amounts of DNA sequence data.
right_sentence: Using powerful computers and algorithms, bioinformatics is used to analyze large amounts of DNA sequence data.

meaning: 항체: 특정 항원과 결합하여 면역 반응을 일으키는 단백질
sentence: The immune system produces a(n) ______ to fight off a foreign virus.
right_sentence: The immune system produces an antibody to fight off a foreign virus.

sentence: The flu vaccine contains a weakened form of the flu virus, which acts as a(n) ______ to stimulate the immune system.
right_sentence: The flu vaccine contains a weakened form of the flu virus, which acts as an antigen to stimulate the immune system.

meaning: 사이토카인: 면역 세포 간의 신호 전달을 돕는 단백질
sentence: A fever is often a result of the release of ______s by the immune system.
right_sentence: A fever is often a result of the release of cytokines by the immune system.

meaning: 대식 세포: 세균이나 죽은 세포를 잡아먹는 면역 세포
sentence: A(n) ______ is a type of white blood cell that plays a key role in the body's defense against infection.
right_sentence: A macrophage is a type of white blood cell that plays a key role in the body's defense against infection.

meaning: 호중구: 세균 감염 시 가장 먼저 반응하는 백혈구
sentence: The doctor's blood test showed a high count of ______s, indicating a recent bacterial infection.
right_sentence: The doctor's blood test showed a high count of neutrophils, indicating a recent bacterial infection.

meaning: 림프구: B세포, T세포 등 면역 반응에 중요한 역할을 하는 백혈구
sentence: These cells are crucial for the body's adaptive immune response and include T cells and B cells.
right_sentence: These cells are crucial for the body's adaptive immune response and include T cells and B cells.

meaning: T세포: 세포 매개성 면역 반응에 관여하는 림프구
sentence: A(n) ______ helps the body fight off viruses and cancer cells.
right_sentence: A T cell helps the body fight off viruses and cancer cells.

meaning: B세포: 항체를 생성하여 체액성 면역 반응에 관여하는 림프구
sentence: When a foreign pathogen is detected, a(n) ______ produces specific antibodies to neutralize it.
right_sentence: When a foreign pathogen is detected, a B cell produces specific antibodies to neutralize it.

sentence: Upon activation, a B cell differentiates into a(n) ______ to secrete large amounts of antibodies.
right_sentence: Upon activation, a B cell differentiates into a plasma cell to secrete large amounts of antibodies.

meaning: 백혈구: 감염과 질병에 대항하는 혈액 세포
sentence: The doctor ordered a white blood cell count to check the number of ______s in the patient's blood.
right_sentence: The doctor ordered a white blood cell count to check the number of leukocytes in the patient's blood.

sentence: The patient's low red blood cell count indicated a problem with their ______ production.
right_sentence: The patient's low red blood cell count indicated a problem with their erythrocyte production.

meaning: 혈소판: 혈액 응고에 관여하는 혈액 세포
sentence: A low ______ count can lead to excessive bruising and bleeding.
right_sentence: A low platelet count can lead to excessive bruising and bleeding.

meaning: 헤모글로빈: 적혈구에 있는 산소 운반 단백질
sentence: The blood test showed that her ______ levels were low, confirming the diagnosis of anemia.
right_sentence: The blood test showed that her hemoglobin levels were low, confirming the diagnosis of anemia.

meaning: 혈종: 혈관 밖으로 나온 혈액이 한 곳에 뭉쳐 생긴 덩어리
sentence: The patient had a large ______ on his arm after the fall.
right_sentence: The patient had a large hematoma on his arm after the fall.

meaning: 반상 출혈: 멍, 피부 아래에 출혈이 생긴 현상
sentence: The nurse noted the large patch of bruising, or ______, on the patient's leg.
right_sentence: The nurse noted the large patch of bruising, or ecchymosis, on the patient's leg.

meaning: 동맥 경화증: 동맥 벽에 지방이 쌓여 혈관이 좁아지고 딱딱해지는 질환
sentence: This condition is often a cause of heart attacks and strokes due to the buildup of plaque in the arteries.
right_sentence: This condition is often a cause of heart attacks and strokes due to the buildup of plaque in the arteries.

meaning: 관상동맥 질환: 심장에 혈액을 공급하는 관상동맥이 좁아지거나 막히는 질환
sentence: The patient's chest pain was a symptom of ______, which can lead to a heart attack.
right_sentence: The patient's chest pain was a symptom of coronary artery disease (CAD), which can lead to a heart attack.

meaning: 협심증: 심근에 혈액 공급이 부족하여 발생하는 가슴 통증
sentence: The patient complained of a squeezing pain in his chest, which the doctor diagnosed as ______.
right_sentence: The patient complained of a squeezing pain in his chest, which the doctor diagnosed as angina.

meaning: 허혈: 조직에 혈액 공급이 부족한 상태
sentence: The doctor was concerned that the patient's narrowed arteries were causing myocardial ______.
right_sentence: The doctor was concerned that the patient's narrowed arteries were causing myocardial ischemia.

meaning: 경색: 혈액 공급 부족으로 조직이 죽는 현상
sentence: A heart attack is also known as a myocardial ______.
right_sentence: A heart attack is also known as a myocardial infarction.

meaning: 서맥: 심박수가 분당 60회 미만으로 느린 상태
sentence: The athlete's resting heart rate was very low, which is a form of ______ but is normal for highly trained individuals.
right_sentence: The athlete's resting heart rate was very low, which is a form of bradycardia but is normal for highly trained individuals.

meaning: 빈맥: 심박수가 분당 100회 이상으로 빠른 상태
sentence: The patient's heart was racing after the panic attack, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: The patient's heart was racing after the panic attack, a condition known as tachycardia.

meaning: 심낭염: 심장을 싸고 있는 막(심낭)에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The patient had sharp chest pain that worsened when lying down, which was a symptom of ______.
right_sentence: The patient had sharp chest pain that worsened when lying down, which was a symptom of pericarditis.

meaning: 심내막염: 심장 내막에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: A bacterial infection that travels through the bloodstream can lead to inflammation of the inner lining of the heart, or ______.
right_sentence: A bacterial infection that travels through the bloodstream can lead to inflammation of the inner lining of the heart, or endocarditis.

meaning: 심근염: 심장 근육에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The virus caused inflammation of the heart muscle, leading to a condition called ______.
right_sentence: The virus caused inflammation of the heart muscle, leading to a condition called myocarditis.

meaning: 무산소증: 산소 공급이 완전히 차단된 상태
sentence: Brain damage can occur quickly if a patient experiences cerebral ______.
right_sentence: Brain damage can occur quickly if a patient experiences cerebral anoxia.

meaning: 저산소증: 조직에 산소 공급이 부족한 상태
sentence: The patient with severe asthma was suffering from ______, which caused his skin to turn bluish.
right_sentence: The patient with severe asthma was suffering from hypoxia, which caused his skin to turn bluish.

sentence: During his sleep study, the patient was found to have episodes of ______, a key sign of sleep apnea.
right_sentence: During his sleep study, the patient was found to have episodes of apnea, a key sign of sleep apnea.

sentence: The patient experienced severe shortness of breath, or ______, after climbing the stairs.
right_sentence: The patient experienced severe shortness of breath, or dyspnea, after climbing the stairs.

meaning: 빈호흡: 호흡이 분당 20회 이상으로 빠른 상태
sentence: The doctor noted the patient's abnormally rapid breathing, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: The doctor noted the patient's abnormally rapid breathing, a condition known as tachypnea.

meaning: 서호흡: 호흡이 분당 12회 미만으로 느린 상태
sentence: After the overdose, the patient's breathing became very slow, a condition called ______.
right_sentence: After the overdose, the patient's breathing became very slow, a condition called bradyapnea.

meaning: 객혈: 기관지나 폐에서 나오는 피를 기침하는 현상
sentence: The patient's cough was accompanied by streaks of blood, a symptom of ______.
right_sentence: The patient's cough was accompanied by streaks of blood, a symptom of hemoptysis.

sentence: The child experienced frequent nosebleeds, or ______, especially during dry weather.
right_sentence: The child experienced frequent nosebleeds, or epistaxis, especially during dry weather.

meaning: 콧물: 코에서 맑은 액체가 흘러나오는 현상
sentence: The patient's constant runny nose was a key symptom of her hay fever.
right_sentence: The patient's constant runny nose was a key symptom of her hay fever.

sentence: Her sore throat was caused by a bacterial infection of the pharynx, known as ______.
right_sentence: Her sore throat was caused by a bacterial infection of the pharynx, known as pharyngitis.

sentence: The singer lost her voice due to inflammation of her vocal cords, a condition called ______.
right_sentence: The singer lost her voice due to inflammation of her vocal cords, a condition called laryngitis.

meaning: 흉막 삼출: 폐와 흉벽 사이의 공간(흉막강)에 비정상적으로 액체가 축적되는 질환
sentence: A chest X-ray revealed fluid in the space around the patient's lungs, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: A chest X-ray revealed fluid in the space around the patient's lungs, a condition known as pleural effusion.

meaning: 농양: 조직 내에 고름이 고여 있는 상태
sentence: The dentist had to drain the painful ______ that had formed at the root of the tooth.
right_sentence: The dentist had to drain the painful abscess that had formed at the root of the tooth.

meaning: 누공: 두 기관이나 기관과 피부 사이에 비정상적으로 연결된 통로
sentence: The patient required surgery to close the ______ that had formed between her colon and bladder.
right_sentence: The patient required surgery to close the fistula that had formed between her colon and bladder.

meaning: 탈장: 신체 장기가 제자리를 벗어나 튀어나오는 질환
sentence: He developed a small bulge in his groin area that was diagnosed as an inguinal ______.
right_sentence: He developed a small bulge in his groin area that was diagnosed as an inguinal hernia.

meaning: 게실증: 대장에 작은 주머니(게실)가 생기는 질환
sentence: The doctor explained that his frequent bowel issues were due to ______, which is common in older adults.
right_sentence: The doctor explained that his frequent bowel issues were due to diverticulosis, which is common in older adults.

sentence: The patient's chronic diarrhea and abdominal pain were symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: The patient's chronic diarrhea and abdominal pain were symptoms of colitis.

sentence: The inflammation of the rectum, known as ______, was causing rectal bleeding and pain.
right_sentence: The inflammation of the rectum, known as proctitis, was causing rectal bleeding and pain.

sentence: A ruptured appendix can lead to a serious infection of the abdominal lining, or ______.
right_sentence: A ruptured appendix can lead to a serious infection of the abdominal lining, or peritonitis.

meaning: 회장루: 소장 끝(회장)을 복벽으로 연결하여 인공 항문을 만드는 수술
sentence: After his colon was removed, the patient had a(n) ______ to allow waste to exit his body.
right_sentence: After his colon was removed, the patient had an ileostomy to allow waste to exit his body.

meaning: 결장루: 대장 일부를 복벽으로 연결하여 인공 항문을 만드는 수술
sentence: A(n) ______ was performed to divert the colon and create a new opening for waste removal.
right_sentence: A colostomy was performed to divert the colon and create a new opening for waste removal.

meaning: 내시경 검사: 내시경을 이용하여 신체 내부를 관찰하는 검사
sentence: The doctor performed a(n) ______ to look for ulcers in the patient's stomach.
right_sentence: The doctor performed an endoscopy to look for ulcers in the patient's stomach.

meaning: 대장 내시경 검사: 대장을 내시경으로 검사하는 검사
sentence: The patient was due for a routine ______ to screen for polyps and colon cancer.
right_sentence: The patient was due for a routine colonoscopy to screen for polyps and colon cancer.

meaning: 위 내시경 검사: 위를 내시경으로 검사하는 검사
sentence: The doctor used a(n) ______ to examine the lining of the patient's stomach for signs of gastritis.
right_sentence: The doctor used a gastroscopy to examine the lining of the patient's stomach for signs of gastritis.

meaning: 생검: 조직을 채취하여 병리학적으로 검사하는 진단 방법
sentence: A(n) ______ was performed to determine if the abnormal growth was cancerous.
right_sentence: A biopsy was performed to determine if the abnormal growth was cancerous.

meaning: 조직학: 조직의 미세 구조를 연구하는 학문
sentence: The pathologist studied the tissue sample under a microscope in the field of ______.
right_sentence: The pathologist studied the tissue sample under a microscope in the field of histology.

meaning: 세포학: 세포의 구조와 기능을 연구하는 학문
sentence: A Pap smear is a form of ______ that checks for abnormal cells in the cervix.
right_sentence: A Pap smear is a form of cytology that checks for abnormal cells in the cervix.

sentence: The doctor was trying to determine the ______ of the patient's rare autoimmune disease.
right_sentence: The doctor was trying to determine the etiology of the patient's rare autoimmune disease.

meaning: 병리학: 질병의 원인, 발생, 진행을 연구하는 학문
sentence: The autopsy was performed by a forensic ______ to determine the cause of death.
right_sentence: The autopsy was performed by a forensic pathology to determine the cause of death.

meaning: 역학: 질병의 발생 원인, 분포, 유행 등을 연구하는 학문
sentence: The spread of the new virus is being studied by experts in ______ to understand its transmission patterns.
right_sentence: The spread of the new virus is being studied by experts in epidemiology to understand its transmission patterns.

sentence: He was prescribed an antibiotic as a(n) ______ to prevent a post-surgical infection.
right_sentence: He was prescribed an antibiotic as a prophylaxis to prevent a post-surgical infection.

meaning: 재활: 질병이나 부상 후 기능 회복을 돕는 과정
sentence: After his stroke, he underwent extensive physical ______ to regain his ability to walk.
right_sentence: After his stroke, he underwent extensive physical rehabilitation to regain his ability to walk.

meaning: 정형외과: 근골격계 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: He saw a doctor specializing in ______ for his chronic knee pain.
right_sentence: He saw a doctor specializing in orthopedics for his chronic knee pain.

meaning: 신경과: 신경계 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The patient with a seizure disorder was referred to a specialist in ______.
right_sentence: The patient with a seizure disorder was referred to a specialist in neurology.

meaning: 심장과: 심장과 혈관 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: She was referred to a(n) ______ specialist for her irregular heartbeat.
right_sentence: She was referred to a cardiology specialist for her irregular heartbeat.

sentence: The patient's cancer treatment was overseen by a team of doctors in ______.
right_sentence: The patient's cancer treatment was overseen by a team of doctors in oncology.

meaning: 소아과: 소아 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The child's family doctor was a(n) ______ specialist.
right_sentence: The child's family doctor was a pediatrics specialist.

meaning: 노인병학: 노인 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The care of the elderly population is the focus of a medical specialty known as ______.
right_sentence: The care of the elderly population is the focus of a medical specialty known as geriatrics.

meaning: 산과: 임신, 출산, 산후 관리를 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The doctor who managed her pregnancy and delivery specialized in ______.
right_sentence: The doctor who managed her pregnancy and delivery specialized in obstetrics.

meaning: 부인과: 여성 생식기 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: She had her annual check-up with a doctor specializing in ______.
right_sentence: She had her annual check-up with a doctor specializing in gynecology.

meaning: 비뇨기과: 비뇨기계와 남성 생식기 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The patient's kidney stones were treated by a specialist in ______.
right_sentence: The patient's kidney stones were treated by a specialist in urology.

meaning: 피부과: 피부 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: He saw a doctor specializing in ______ for his persistent acne.
right_sentence: He saw a doctor specializing in dermatology for his persistent acne.

meaning: 안과: 눈과 시각계 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The patient with glaucoma was being treated by a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The patient with glaucoma was being treated by a(n) ophthalmology.

meaning: 이비인후과: 귀, 코, 목구멍 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The child with chronic ear infections was referred to a(n) ______ specialist.
right_sentence: The child with chronic ear infections was referred to an otolaryngology specialist.

meaning: 소화기내과: 소화기계 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The patient with Crohn's disease was being managed by a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The patient with Crohn's disease was being managed by a gastroenterology.

meaning: 내분비내과: 호르몬과 내분비계 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The patient with diabetes was being treated by a(n) ______ specialist.
right_sentence: The patient with diabetes was being treated by an endocrinology specialist.

meaning: 신장내과: 신장 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The patient with chronic kidney disease was under the care of a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The patient with chronic kidney disease was under the care of a nephrology.

meaning: 류마티스내과: 관절, 근육, 결합 조직 질환을 다루는 의학 분야
sentence: The patient with rheumatoid arthritis was being treated by a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The patient with rheumatoid arthritis was being treated by a rheumatology.

meaning: 마취: 수술 시 통증을 없애거나 의식을 소실시키는 의료 기술
sentence: The patient was put under deep ______ for the major surgery.
right_sentence: The patient was put under deep anesthesia for the major surgery.

sentence: An epidural provides local ______ to the lower body during childbirth.
right_sentence: An epidural provides local analgesia to the lower body during childbirth.

meaning: 감각 이상: 저림, 따끔거림 등의 비정상적인 감각
sentence: He experienced a tingling sensation, or ______, in his fingers due to nerve compression.
right_sentence: He experienced a tingling sensation, or paresthesia, in his fingers due to nerve compression.

meaning: 연하 곤란: 음식을 삼키기 어려운 증상
sentence: The patient with a stroke was suffering from ______, making it difficult to eat or drink.
right_sentence: The patient with a stroke was suffering from dysphagia, making it difficult to eat or drink.

sentence: After the brain injury, the patient had great difficulty speaking and understanding, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: After the brain injury, the patient had great difficulty speaking and understanding, a condition known as aphasia.

meaning: 언어 장애: 언어 능력에 부분적인 장애가 있는 상태
sentence: The child had a developmental disorder that caused partial language impairment, or ______.
right_sentence: The child had a developmental disorder that caused partial language impairment, or dysphasia.

meaning: 운동 실조증: 근육 운동의 협응 능력이 상실된 상태
sentence: The patient's unsteady gait and lack of coordination were classic signs of cerebellar ______.
right_sentence: The patient's unsteady gait and lack of coordination were classic signs of cerebellar ataxia.

meaning: 어지럼증: 자신이나 주위 환경이 빙글빙글 도는 듯한 느낌
sentence: He experienced a severe episode of spinning dizziness, which the doctor diagnosed as ______.
right_sentence: He experienced a severe episode of spinning dizziness, which the doctor diagnosed as vertigo.

meaning: 실신: 뇌의 혈액 공급 부족으로 인한 일시적인 의식 상실
sentence: The patient fainted in the crowded room, an event also known as ______.
right_sentence: The patient fainted in the crowded room, an event also known as syncope.

meaning: 기면증: 갑자기 잠에 빠지는 신경계 질환
sentence: The patient's uncontrolled sleepiness during the day was a symptom of ______.
right_sentence: The patient's uncontrolled sleepiness during the day was a symptom of narcolepsy.

meaning: 불면증: 수면을 시작하거나 유지하기 어려운 질환
sentence: She has been suffering from chronic ______ for months, unable to get a full night's sleep.
right_sentence: She has been suffering from chronic insomnia for months, unable to get a full night's sleep.

meaning: 우울증: 지속적인 슬픔과 무기력감을 특징으로 하는 정신 질환
sentence: He was diagnosed with clinical ______ and began therapy and medication.
right_sentence: He was diagnosed with clinical depression and began therapy and medication.

meaning: 불안증: 과도한 걱정과 불안을 특징으로 하는 정신 질환
sentence: Her panic attacks and constant worry were symptoms of a(n) ______ disorder.
right_sentence: Her panic attacks and constant worry were symptoms of an anxiety disorder.

meaning: 공포증: 특정 대상이나 상황에 대한 비합리적인 공포
sentence: He has a severe fear of heights, a condition known as acrophobia.
right_sentence: He has a severe fear of heights, a condition known as acrophobia.

meaning: 조현병: 사고, 감정, 행동에 장애를 보이는 만성 정신 질환
sentence: The patient's hallucinations and disorganized thoughts were a sign of ______.
right_sentence: The patient's hallucinations and disorganized thoughts were a sign of schizophrenia.

meaning: 양극성 장애: 조증과 우울증이 교대로 나타나는 정신 질환
sentence: The patient experienced extreme mood swings from euphoria to deep despair, which is characteristic of ______.
right_sentence: The patient experienced extreme mood swings from euphoria to deep despair, which is characteristic of bipolar disorder.

meaning: 자폐 스펙트럼 장애: 사회적 상호작용과 의사소통에 어려움을 겪는 발달 장애
sentence: The child showed repetitive behaviors and difficulty with social cues, leading to a diagnosis of ______.
right_sentence: The child showed repetitive behaviors and difficulty with social cues, leading to a diagnosis of autism spectrum disorder (ASD).

meaning: 주의력 결핍 과잉 행동 장애: 주의력 부족, 과잉 행동, 충동성을 특징으로 하는 신경 발달 장애
sentence: The child's inability to focus in class and constant restlessness were symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: The child's inability to focus in class and constant restlessness were symptoms of attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD).

meaning: 난독증: 글자를 읽는 데 어려움을 겪는 학습 장애
sentence: The student, despite being intelligent, had difficulty with reading and spelling due to ______.
right_sentence: The student, despite being intelligent, had difficulty with reading and spelling due to dyslexia.

meaning: 당뇨병: 인슐린 부족으로 혈당 조절에 문제가 생기는 질환
sentence: Frequent urination and increased thirst are common symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: Frequent urination and increased thirst are common symptoms of diabetes mellitus.

meaning: 저혈당: 혈당 수치가 정상보다 낮은 상태
sentence: The diabetic patient felt dizzy and shaky, which were signs of ______.
right_sentence: The diabetic patient felt dizzy and shaky, which were signs of hypoglycemia.

meaning: 고혈당: 혈당 수치가 정상보다 높은 상태
sentence: Uncontrolled ______ can lead to long-term complications of diabetes.
right_sentence: Uncontrolled hyperglycemia can lead to long-term complications of diabetes.

sentence: The patient's neck was swollen and tender, and blood tests revealed an inflamed thyroid, a condition called ______.
right_sentence: The patient's neck was swollen and tender, and blood tests revealed an inflamed thyroid, a condition called thyroiditis.

meaning: 갑상선 기능 항진증: 갑상선 호르몬이 과도하게 분비되는 질환
sentence: She experienced weight loss, rapid heartbeat, and anxiety, which are symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: She experienced weight loss, rapid heartbeat, and anxiety, which are symptoms of hyperthyroidism.

meaning: 갑상선 기능 저하증: 갑상선 호르몬이 부족하게 분비되는 질환
sentence: The patient's fatigue, weight gain, and cold intolerance were symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: The patient's fatigue, weight gain, and cold intolerance were symptoms of hypothyroidism.

meaning: 말단 비대증: 성장 호르몬이 과도하게 분비되어 신체 말단이 비대해지는 질환
sentence: The patient's enlarged hands and feet were a sign of the hormonal disorder known as ______.
right_sentence: The patient's enlarged hands and feet were a sign of the hormonal disorder known as acromegaly.

meaning: 쿠싱 증후군: 부신피질 호르몬(코르티솔)이 과도하게 분비되는 질환
sentence: Weight gain around the midsection, a rounded face, and thin skin are classic signs of ______.
right_sentence: Weight gain around the midsection, a rounded face, and thin skin are classic signs of Cushing's syndrome.

meaning: 애디슨병: 부신피질 호르몬이 부족하게 분비되는 질환
sentence: The patient's fatigue, low blood pressure, and skin darkening were symptoms of the rare endocrine disorder, ______.
right_sentence: The patient's fatigue, low blood pressure, and skin darkening were symptoms of the rare endocrine disorder, Addison's disease.

meaning: 뇌하수체 선종: 뇌하수체에 발생하는 양성 종양
sentence: The patient's vision problems and headaches were caused by a tumor on the pituitary gland, a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The patient's vision problems and headaches were caused by a tumor on the pituitary gland, a pituitary adenoma.

meaning: 사구체신염: 신장의 사구체에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The patient's blood and protein in the urine were signs of ______.
right_sentence: The patient's blood and protein in the urine were signs of glomerulonephritis.

meaning: 신우신염: 신장과 신우에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: A severe urinary tract infection can spread to the kidneys, causing a condition called ______.
right_sentence: A severe urinary tract infection can spread to the kidneys, causing a condition called pyelonephritis.

meaning: 신장 결석: 신장에 돌이 생기는 질환
sentence: The patient's excruciating pain in his back was caused by a kidney stone, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: The patient's excruciating pain in his back was caused by a kidney stone, a condition known as nephrolithiasis.

meaning: 요도 하열: 남성 요도 입구가 음경 끝이 아닌 아래쪽에 위치하는 선천성 기형
sentence: The newborn boy was diagnosed with a congenital condition where the urethra opening was on the underside of the penis.
right_sentence: The newborn boy was diagnosed with a congenital condition where the urethra opening was on the underside of the penis.

meaning: 잠복 고환: 고환이 음낭으로 내려오지 않은 상태
sentence: The doctor noted that one of the infant's testicles had not descended, a condition called ______.
right_sentence: The doctor noted that one of the infant's testicles had not descended, a condition called cryptorchidism.

meaning: 양성 전립선 비대증: 전립선이 커져 소변 흐름을 방해하는 질환
sentence: The elderly man had difficulty urinating due to an enlarged prostate, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: The elderly man had difficulty urinating due to an enlarged prostate, a condition known as benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH).

meaning: 방광 탈출증: 방광이 질 쪽으로 돌출되는 질환
sentence: The patient's bladder had weakened and prolapsed into her vagina, a condition known as a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The patient's bladder had weakened and prolapsed into her vagina, a condition known as a cystocele.

meaning: 자궁외 임신: 수정란이 자궁 밖에서 착상하는 임신
sentence: The woman experienced severe abdominal pain, and an ultrasound revealed a(n) ______ in her fallopian tube.
right_sentence: The woman experienced severe abdominal pain, and an ultrasound revealed an ectopic pregnancy in her fallopian tube.

meaning: 자궁내막증: 자궁 내막 조직이 자궁 밖에서 자라는 질환
sentence: This painful condition occurs when tissue similar to the lining of the uterus grows outside the uterus.
right_sentence: This painful condition occurs when tissue similar to the lining of the uterus grows outside the uterus.

meaning: 자간전증: 임신 중 고혈압과 단백뇨가 발생하는 질환
sentence: The pregnant woman's elevated blood pressure and swelling were signs of ______.
right_sentence: The pregnant woman's elevated blood pressure and swelling were signs of preeclampsia.

meaning: 유산: 태아가 생존 능력이 없는 상태에서 임신이 종결되는 것
sentence: The doctor confirmed that the woman had a spontaneous ______, or miscarriage.
right_sentence: The doctor confirmed that the woman had a spontaneous abortion, or miscarriage.

meaning: 제왕 절개: 복부 절개를 통해 아기를 출산하는 수술
sentence: The baby was delivered surgically through a(n) ______ after a difficult labor.
right_sentence: The baby was delivered surgically through a cesarean section (C-section) after a difficult labor.

meaning: 회장루: 소장 끝(회장)을 복벽으로 연결하여 인공 항문을 만드는 수술
sentence: After his colon was removed, the patient had a(n) ______ to allow waste to exit his body.
right_sentence: After his colon was removed, the patient had an ileostomy to allow waste to exit his body.

meaning: 결장루: 대장을 복벽으로 연결하여 인공 항문을 만드는 수술
sentence: He needed a(n) ______ after a part of his large intestine was resected due to cancer.
right_sentence: He needed a colostomy after a part of his large intestine was resected due to cancer.

meaning: 위 절제술: 위암 등의 치료를 위해 위를 제거하는 수술
sentence: The surgeon performed a(n) ______ to remove the cancerous part of the patient's stomach.
right_sentence: The surgeon performed a gastrectomy to remove the cancerous part of the patient's stomach.

meaning: 신장 절제술: 신장 질환 치료를 위해 신장을 제거하는 수술
sentence: He underwent a(n) ______ to treat his aggressive kidney cancer.
right_sentence: He underwent a nephrectomy to treat his aggressive kidney cancer.

meaning: 자궁 절제술: 자궁 질환 치료를 위해 자궁을 제거하는 수술
sentence: Her doctor recommended a(n) ______ as a treatment for her severe uterine fibroids.
right_sentence: Her doctor recommended a hysterectomy as a treatment for her severe uterine fibroids.

meaning: 기관 절개술: 호흡 곤란을 완화하기 위해 목에 구멍을 뚫어 기관에 관을 삽입하는 수술
sentence: In an emergency, a(n) ______ was performed to create an airway for the patient who couldn't breathe.
right_sentence: In an emergency, a tracheotomy was performed to create an airway for the patient who couldn't breathe.

meaning: 관절 성형술: 손상된 관절을 재건하거나 인공 관절로 대체하는 수술
sentence: She had a total hip ______ to relieve the pain from her severe arthritis.
right_sentence: She had a total hip arthroplasty to relieve the pain from her severe arthritis.

meaning: 뇌경색: 뇌혈관이 막혀서 뇌 조직이 손상되는 질환
sentence: An MRI scan revealed a(n) ______ caused by a blood clot blocking an artery in the brain.
right_sentence: An MRI scan revealed a cerebral infarction caused by a blood clot blocking an artery in the brain.

meaning: 죽상동맥경화증: 동맥 벽에 지방이 쌓여 혈관이 좁아지고 딱딱해지는 질환
sentence: High cholesterol can lead to the buildup of plaque in the arteries, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: High cholesterol can lead to the buildup of plaque in the arteries, a condition known as atherosclerosis.

meaning: 저혈당: 혈액 내 포도당 수치가 정상보다 낮은 상태
sentence: The diabetic patient became dizzy and shaky, symptoms of a(n) ______ episode.
right_sentence: The diabetic patient became dizzy and shaky, symptoms of a hypoglycemic episode.

meaning: 고혈당: 혈액 내 포도당 수치가 정상보다 높은 상태
sentence: The doctor warned him about the risks of uncontrolled diabetes, including a(n) ______ crisis.
right_sentence: The doctor warned him about the risks of uncontrolled diabetes, including a hyperglycemic crisis.

sentence: Her doctor advised her to reduce her salt intake to help manage her chronic ______.
right_sentence: Her doctor advised her to reduce her salt intake to help manage her chronic hypertension.

meaning: 저혈압: 혈압이 정상 범위보다 낮은 상태
sentence: The patient fainted when they stood up too quickly, a symptom of orthostatic ______.
right_sentence: The patient fainted when they stood up too quickly, a symptom of orthostatic hypotension.

meaning: 서맥: 심장 박동이 비정상적으로 느린 상태
sentence: A very slow heart rate below 60 beats per minute is called ______.
right_sentence: A very slow heart rate below 60 beats per minute is called bradycardia.

meaning: 빈맥: 심장 박동이 비정상적으로 빠른 상태
sentence: During the panic attack, the patient experienced a rapid heartbeat, or ______.
right_sentence: During the panic attack, the patient experienced a rapid heartbeat, or tachycardia.

meaning: 부정맥: 심장 박동이 불규칙하거나 비정상적인 상태
sentence: The cardiologist used an EKG to diagnose the patient's heart fluttering as a type of ______.
right_sentence: The cardiologist used an EKG to diagnose the patient's heart fluttering as a type of arrhythmia.

meaning: 아나필락시스: 생명을 위협할 수 있는 심각한 전신 알레르기 반응
sentence: After being stung by a bee, the boy went into a(n) ______ shock, which required an immediate epinephrine injection.
right_sentence: After being stung by a bee, the boy went into an anaphylaxis shock, which required an immediate epinephrine injection.

meaning: 패혈증: 감염으로 인해 전신에 염증 반응이 나타나는 심각한 질환
sentence: The elderly patient was hospitalized for a severe urinary tract infection that progressed to ______.
right_sentence: The elderly patient was hospitalized for a severe urinary tract infection that progressed to sepsis.

meaning: 허혈: 조직에 혈액 공급이 부족한 상태
sentence: Chest pain, or angina, is often a symptom of myocardial ______.
right_sentence: Chest pain, or angina, is often a symptom of myocardial ischemia.

meaning: 괴사: 질병이나 손상으로 인해 세포나 조직이 죽는 것
sentence: The severe frostbite led to tissue ______ in his toes, which required amputation.
right_sentence: The severe frostbite led to tissue necrosis in his toes, which required amputation.

meaning: 부종: 조직에 과도한 체액이 축적되어 붓는 현상
sentence: The patient with congestive heart failure had noticeable fluid retention in his legs, a condition called pitting ______.
right_sentence: The patient with congestive heart failure had noticeable fluid retention in his legs, a condition called pitting edema.

sentence: The doctor diagnosed the patient's fever, cough, and shortness of breath as bacterial ______.
right_sentence: The doctor diagnosed the patient's fever, cough, and shortness of breath as bacterial pneumonia.

meaning: 천식: 기관지 염증으로 인한 호흡 곤란
sentence: He carries a rescue inhaler to manage his intermittent ______ attacks.
right_sentence: He carries a rescue inhaler to manage his intermittent asthma attacks.

sentence: A prolonged cough with mucus production is a classic symptom of chronic ______.
right_sentence: A prolonged cough with mucus production is a classic symptom of chronic bronchitis.

meaning: 폐기종: 폐포가 손상되어 호흡 곤란이 발생하는 만성 폐 질환
sentence: Smoking is the most common cause of ______, a condition that makes it difficult to breathe.
right_sentence: Smoking is the most common cause of emphysema, a condition that makes it difficult to breathe.

meaning: 결핵: 폐를 주로 침범하는 세균성 감염병
sentence: The patient had a persistent cough, fever, and weight loss, and was tested for ______.
right_sentence: The patient had a persistent cough, fever, and weight loss, and was tested for tuberculosis (TB).

meaning: 위염: 위 점막에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The patient's stomach pain was diagnosed as chronic ______.
right_sentence: The patient's stomach pain was diagnosed as chronic gastritis.

sentence: Viral ______ can cause jaundice, fatigue, and abdominal pain.
right_sentence: Viral hepatitis can cause jaundice, fatigue, and abdominal pain.

meaning: 간경변증: 간이 만성적인 염증으로 인해 굳어지는 질환
sentence: Years of excessive alcohol consumption can lead to liver scarring, a condition called ______.
right_sentence: Years of excessive alcohol consumption can lead to liver scarring, a condition called cirrhosis.

sentence: Severe abdominal pain radiating to the back is a hallmark symptom of ______.
right_sentence: Severe abdominal pain radiating to the back is a hallmark symptom of pancreatitis.

meaning: 충수염: 맹장 끝에 위치한 충수 돌기에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The sharp pain in the lower right side of the abdomen was a classic sign of ______.
right_sentence: The sharp pain in the lower right side of the abdomen was a classic sign of appendicitis.

meaning: 게실염: 대장의 작은 주머니(게실)에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The patient was advised to increase their fiber intake to prevent flare-ups of their ______.
right_sentence: The patient was advised to increase their fiber intake to prevent flare-ups of their diverticulitis.

sentence: A biopsy confirmed that the kidney damage was caused by a chronic ______.
right_sentence: A biopsy confirmed that the kidney damage was caused by a chronic nephritis.

sentence: Frequent, painful urination is a common symptom of bladder inflammation, or ______.
right_sentence: Frequent, painful urination is a common symptom of bladder inflammation, or cystitis.

meaning: 녹내장: 안압 상승으로 시신경이 손상되어 시야가 좁아지는 질환
sentence: The eye drops were prescribed to lower the intraocular pressure and prevent the progression of ______.
right_sentence: The eye drops were prescribed to lower the intraocular pressure and prevent the progression of glaucoma.

meaning: 백내장: 눈의 수정체가 혼탁해져 시력이 저하되는 질환
sentence: He noticed that his vision was becoming cloudy and blurry, a common sign of a(n) ______.
right_sentence: He noticed that his vision was becoming cloudy and blurry, a common sign of a cataract.

meaning: 황반 변성: 망막의 중심부(황반)가 손상되어 시야 중심부가 흐려지는 질환
sentence: The ophthalmologist warned that the patient's central vision loss was due to age-related ______.
right_sentence: The ophthalmologist warned that the patient's central vision loss was due to age-related macular degeneration.

meaning: 근시: 가까운 것은 잘 보이나 먼 것은 흐릿하게 보이는 상태
sentence: She needed to wear glasses to correct her ______.
right_sentence: She needed to wear glasses to correct her myopia.

meaning: 원시: 가까운 것은 흐릿하게 보이나 먼 것은 잘 보이는 상태
sentence: He had difficulty reading small print up close, a symptom of his ______.
right_sentence: He had difficulty reading small print up close, a symptom of his hyperopia.

meaning: 난시: 눈의 굴절면이 불균형하여 상이 흐릿하게 보이는 상태
sentence: The doctor explained that her blurry and distorted vision was caused by a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The doctor explained that her blurry and distorted vision was caused by an astigmatism.

sentence: The pediatrician diagnosed the child with a middle ear infection, or ______.
right_sentence: The pediatrician diagnosed the child with a middle ear infection, or otitis media.

meaning: 이명: 외부 소리 없이 귀에서 소리가 들리는 현상
sentence: The constant ringing in his ears was a persistent and annoying symptom of his chronic ______.
right_sentence: The constant ringing in his ears was a persistent and annoying symptom of his chronic tinnitus.

meaning: 어지럼증: 자신이나 주위 환경이 빙글빙글 도는 듯한 느낌
sentence: He was prescribed medication to help with the spinning sensation caused by his severe ______.
right_sentence: He was prescribed medication to help with the spinning sensation caused by his severe vertigo.

meaning: 부비동염: 코 주위의 부비동에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The facial pain and pressure were caused by a chronic inflammation of the sinuses, or ______.
right_sentence: The facial pain and pressure were caused by a chronic inflammation of the sinuses, or sinusitis.

meaning: 편도선염: 목의 편도에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: His sore throat and difficulty swallowing were caused by a bacterial infection of the tonsils, known as ______.
right_sentence: His sore throat and difficulty swallowing were caused by a bacterial infection of the tonsils, known as tonsillitis.

meaning: 건선: 피부에 붉은 반점과 은백색 인설이 나타나는 만성 질환
sentence: The dermatologist prescribed a topical cream to help manage her flare-ups of ______.
right_sentence: The dermatologist prescribed a topical cream to help manage her flare-ups of psoriasis.

meaning: 습진: 피부에 나타나는 만성적인 염증성 질환
sentence: The infant had a red, itchy rash on his cheeks, a classic sign of infantile ______.
right_sentence: The infant had a red, itchy rash on his cheeks, a classic sign of infantile eczema.

sentence: Contact with poison ivy caused a(n) ______ on her arm.
right_sentence: Contact with poison ivy caused a dermatitis on her arm.

meaning: 골다공증: 뼈의 밀도가 낮아져 골절 위험이 높아지는 질환
sentence: The bone density scan confirmed that the elderly woman had ______.
right_sentence: The bone density scan confirmed that the elderly woman had osteoporosis.

sentence: She has been taking medication for years to manage the pain and swelling in her joints caused by rheumatoid ______.
right_sentence: She has been taking medication for years to manage the pain and swelling in her joints caused by rheumatoid arthritis.

meaning: 통풍: 요산이 관절에 쌓여 염증과 통증을 유발하는 질환
sentence: The doctor advised him to avoid red meat and alcohol to prevent attacks of ______.
right_sentence: The doctor advised him to avoid red meat and alcohol to prevent attacks of gout.

meaning: 척추측만증: 척추가 비정상적으로 옆으로 휘는 상태
sentence: The physical therapist gave her exercises to help correct her mild spinal curvature, or ______.
right_sentence: The physical therapist gave her exercises to help correct her mild spinal curvature, or scoliosis.

meaning: 탈장: 신체 장기가 제자리를 벗어나 튀어나오는 질환
sentence: The surgeon repaired the bulge in the abdominal wall, which was a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The surgeon repaired the bulge in the abdominal wall, which was a hernia.

meaning: 셀리악병: 글루텐에 대한 자가면역 반응으로 소장에 염증이 생기는 질환
sentence: Patients with ______ must follow a strict gluten-free diet to prevent intestinal damage.
right_sentence: Patients with celiac disease must follow a strict gluten-free diet to prevent intestinal damage.

meaning: 당뇨병: 인슐린 분비 부족이나 작용 이상으로 혈당이 높아지는 질환
sentence: Type 1 and Type 2 are the most common forms of ______.
right_sentence: Type 1 and Type 2 are the most common forms of diabetes mellitus.

meaning: 갑상선 기능 항진증: 갑상선 호르몬이 과도하게 분비되는 질환
sentence: Unexplained weight loss, a rapid heartbeat, and anxiety are all symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: Unexplained weight loss, a rapid heartbeat, and anxiety are all symptoms of hyperthyroidism.

meaning: 갑상선 기능 저하증: 갑상선 호르몬이 부족하게 분비되는 질환
sentence: Fatigue, weight gain, and feeling cold are common symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: Fatigue, weight gain, and feeling cold are common symptoms of hypothyroidism.

meaning: 애디슨병: 부신 기능 부전으로 코르티솔 등의 호르몬이 부족해지는 질환
sentence: The patient with darkening skin, muscle weakness, and fatigue was diagnosed with ______.
right_sentence: The patient with darkening skin, muscle weakness, and fatigue was diagnosed with Addison's disease.

meaning: 쿠싱 증후군: 코르티솔 호르몬이 과도하게 분비되어 발생하는 질환
sentence: A round, moon-shaped face and a hump between the shoulders are characteristic signs of ______.
right_sentence: A round, moon-shaped face and a hump between the shoulders are characteristic signs of Cushing's syndrome.

meaning: 알츠하이머병: 뇌 신경 세포가 파괴되어 기억력과 인지 기능이 점진적으로 악화되는 퇴행성 뇌 질환
sentence: The elderly patient's progressive memory loss and confusion were symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: The elderly patient's progressive memory loss and confusion were symptoms of Alzheimer's disease.

meaning: 파킨슨병: 뇌의 도파민 생성 세포가 파괴되어 운동 기능에 장애가 생기는 퇴행성 뇌 질환
sentence: Symptoms such as tremors, stiffness, and difficulty with balance are characteristic of ______.
right_sentence: Symptoms such as tremors, stiffness, and difficulty with balance are characteristic of Parkinson's disease.

meaning: 간질: 뇌의 비정상적인 전기적 활동으로 인해 반복적으로 발작이 일어나는 질환
sentence: The doctor prescribed an anticonvulsant medication to control the patient's seizures caused by ______.
right_sentence: The doctor prescribed an anticonvulsant medication to control the patient's seizures caused by epilepsy.

meaning: 다발성 경화증: 뇌와 척수의 신경 세포를 둘러싼 보호막이 손상되어 발생하는 자가면역 질환
sentence: Symptoms like numbness, vision problems, and fatigue are common in people with ______.
right_sentence: Symptoms like numbness, vision problems, and fatigue are common in people with multiple sclerosis (MS).

meaning: 정신분열병: 사고, 감정, 행동 등에 장애를 일으키는 만성 정신 질환
sentence: A person experiencing hallucinations and delusions may be diagnosed with ______.
right_sentence: A person experiencing hallucinations and delusions may be diagnosed with schizophrenia.

meaning: 우울증: 지속적인 슬픔과 무기력, 흥미 상실 등의 증상을 동반하는 정신 질환
sentence: Feelings of hopelessness and loss of interest in activities were key symptoms of her severe ______.
right_sentence: Feelings of hopelessness and loss of interest in activities were key symptoms of her severe depression.

meaning: 양극성 장애: 기분, 에너지, 활동 수준의 극단적인 변화를 특징으로 하는 정신 질환
sentence: The patient experienced episodes of both extreme mania and severe depression, a condition known as ______.
right_sentence: The patient experienced episodes of both extreme mania and severe depression, a condition known as bipolar disorder.

meaning: 불안 장애: 과도한 걱정, 불안, 공포를 특징으로 하는 정신 질환
sentence: She often had panic attacks and felt overwhelming dread, which were signs of her generalized ______.
right_sentence: She often had panic attacks and felt overwhelming dread, which were signs of her generalized anxiety disorder.

meaning: 강박 장애: 원치 않는 강박적인 생각과 반복적인 행동을 특징으로 하는 정신 질환
sentence: He spent hours a day performing rituals to relieve his unwanted thoughts, a behavior associated with ______.
right_sentence: He spent hours a day performing rituals to relieve his unwanted thoughts, a behavior associated with obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).

meaning: 외상 후 스트레스 장애: 충격적인 사건 이후에 발생하는 정신 질환
sentence: After the car accident, the patient had flashbacks and nightmares, which were symptoms of ______.
right_sentence: After the car accident, the patient had flashbacks and nightmares, which were symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD).

meaning: 투렛 증후군: 반복적인 운동 틱과 음성 틱을 특징으로 하는 신경계 질환
sentence: The child with sudden, involuntary vocalizations and movements was diagnosed with ______.
right_sentence: The child with sudden, involuntary vocalizations and movements was diagnosed with Tourette's syndrome.

meaning: 주의력 결핍 과잉 행동 장애: 주의력 부족, 과잉 행동, 충동성을 특징으로 하는 신경 발달 질환
sentence: The child struggled to focus in class and was often impulsive, which led to a diagnosis of ______.
right_sentence: The child struggled to focus in class and was often impulsive, which led to a diagnosis of attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD).

meaning: 자폐 스펙트럼 장애: 사회적 상호 작용 및 의사소통에 어려움을 겪는 신경 발달 장애
sentence: The child showed repetitive behaviors and difficulty with social communication, which are key features of ______.
right_sentence: The child showed repetitive behaviors and difficulty with social communication, which are key features of autism spectrum disorder (ASD).

meaning: 신경성 식욕 부진증: 체중 증가에 대한 강한 공포로 인해 음식 섭취를 극도로 제한하는 섭식 장애
sentence: Despite being severely underweight, the patient with a distorted body image continued to refuse food, a symptom of ______.
right_sentence: Despite being severely underweight, the patient with a distorted body image continued to refuse food, a symptom of anorexia nervosa.

meaning: 신경성 폭식증: 폭식 후 체중 증가를 막기 위해 구토, 하제 사용 등의 보상 행동을 하는 섭식 장애
sentence: The patient's cycle of binge eating followed by self-induced vomiting was a classic sign of ______.
right_sentence: The patient's cycle of binge eating followed by self-induced vomiting was a classic sign of bulimia nervosa.

meaning: 기면증: 주간에 참을 수 없는 졸음과 갑작스러운 수면 발작을 특징으로 하는 신경 질환
sentence: He often fell asleep unexpectedly during the day, even in the middle of a conversation, a symptom of ______.
right_sentence: He often fell asleep unexpectedly during the day, even in the middle of a conversation, a symptom of narcolepsy.

meaning: 불면증: 잠들거나 잠을 유지하는 데 어려움을 겪는 수면 장애
sentence: He was prescribed sleeping pills to help with his chronic ______.
right_sentence: He was prescribed sleeping pills to help with his chronic insomnia.

meaning: 수면 무호흡증: 수면 중에 호흡이 일시적으로 멈추는 질환
sentence: His partner noticed that he would stop breathing for short periods during the night, a sign of ______.
right_sentence: His partner noticed that he would stop breathing for short periods during the night, a sign of sleep apnea.

meaning: 셀리악병: 글루텐에 대한 자가면역 반응으로 소장에 염증이 생기는 질환
sentence: He was diagnosed with a(n) ______ and had to eliminate all wheat, barley, and rye from his diet.
right_sentence: He was diagnosed with celiac disease and had to eliminate all wheat, barley, and rye from his diet.

meaning: 골수염: 뼈나 골수에 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: The patient's high fever and bone pain were caused by a bacterial infection in his leg, known as ______.
right_sentence: The patient's high fever and bone pain were caused by a bacterial infection in his leg, known as osteomyelitis.

meaning: 화농성 관절염: 관절에 세균이 감염되어 염증이 생긴 질환
sentence: A painful, swollen, and hot joint is a hallmark symptom of ______.
right_sentence: A painful, swollen, and hot joint is a hallmark symptom of septic arthritis.

meaning: 섬유근육통: 전신 통증, 피로, 수면 장애 등을 특징으로 하는 만성 질환
sentence: She experienced widespread muscle pain and chronic fatigue, which the doctor diagnosed as ______.
right_sentence: She experienced widespread muscle pain and chronic fatigue, which the doctor diagnosed as fibromyalgia.

meaning: 기흉: 폐와 흉벽 사이 공간에 공기가 차는 질환
sentence: The sudden chest pain and shortness of breath were caused by a collapsed lung, also known as a(n) ______.
right_sentence: The sudden chest pain and shortness of breath were caused by a collapsed lung, also known as a pneumothorax.

meaning: 혈흉: 폐와 흉벽 사이 공간에 혈액이 차는 질환
sentence: After the trauma, a chest tube was inserted to drain the blood from the pleural cavity, a condition known as a(n) ______.
right_sentence: After the trauma, a chest tube was inserted to drain the blood from the pleural cavity, a condition known as a hemothorax.

meaning: 수두증: 뇌실에 뇌척수액이 과도하게 축적되는 질환
sentence: A buildup of fluid in the brain can cause a condition called ______.
right_sentence: A buildup of fluid in the brain can cause a condition called hydrocephalus.

sentence: The viral infection caused inflammation of the brain, a severe condition known as ______.
right_sentence: The viral infection caused inflammation of the brain, a severe condition known as encephalitis.
